thread.title: NYC Mayor Presses for Tougher Traffic Enforcement Laws

author: Mara Gay
title: NYC Mayor Presses for Tougher Traffic Enforcement Laws
text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio says he will push for a package of tougher traffic enforcement laws in Albany, after a deadly crash earlier this month left two small children dead in Brooklyn.
One proposal would allow the city to install speed cameras at an additional 150 school zones, nearly double the number of zones allowed under current state law.
